DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year of the symptom onset.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The start, beginning, or early stages of a condition or disease. Some examples of symptoms are headache, fever, fatigue, nausea, vomiting, and pain.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An indication that a person has a condition or disease.  Some examples of symptoms are headache, fever, fatigue, nausea, vomiting, and pain.

Concepts.definition: Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient.

Property.preferredDefinition: Onset; the beginning or early stages.

Concepts.definition: The start, beginning, or early stages.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 6/2/16 versioned to sync long name, short name, and definition to semantics (removed date/DT) from names and definition.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created new version associated to different CD and Display Format as part of NMDP Date VD clean up 4/2009. mcooper Corrected def from KM change. AK 3/25/19
